body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.1 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Fixes for Photoshop CS3 and Office 2007 installers.
More progress on gdiplus.
Support for Unicode files in regedit.
Improved video playback.
Many Richedit fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
